item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，起亚美国公司将召回超过 13.7 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，起亚美国公司将在美国召回137256辆汽车，原因是活塞油环可能制造不正确，可能导致发动机损坏。【原文：Kia America is recalling 137,256 vehicles in the United States over concerns that piston oil rings may have been manufactured incorrectly, which can result in engine damage, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 壳牌预计到 2040 年全球液化天然气需求将增长 60
item.description: 壳牌周二在一份年度报告中说，到2040年，全球对液化天然气的需求预计将增加约60%，这主要是受亚洲经济增长、人工智能的影响以及重工业和运输业减排努力的推动。【原文：Global demand for liquefied natural gas is estimated to rise by around 60% by 2040, driven largely by economic growth in Asia, AI impact and efforts to cut emissions in heavy industries and transportation, Shell said in an annual report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 香港高等法院撤回针对世茂的清盘申请
item.description: 世茂集团周二表示，香港高等法院已下令撤回京东方领汇投资对中国房地产公司世茂集团提出的清盘呈请。【原文：The Hong Kong High Court has ordered the withdrawal of the winding-up petition against Chinese property company Shimao Group filed by CPYM Link Investment, Shimao said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿布扎比阿提哈德航空公司计划本周宣布首次公开募股 - 消息人士
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，阿布扎比阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）的目标是在本周宣布启动价值 10 亿美元的首次公开募股，这将是近两年来海湾地区大型航空公司的首次公开募股。【原文：Abu Dhabi's Etihad Airways aims to announce the launch of a $1 billion initial public offering this week, two sources told Reuters, in what would be the first IPO of a major Gulf airline in nearly two years.】

item.title: 美联储洛根提出贴现窗口贷款拍卖机制的构想
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）周二提出了将美联储资产负债表的 "适度 "部分分配给贷款和回购的想法，或许可以举行贴现窗口贷款的每日拍卖。【原文：Dallas Federal Reserve Bank President Lorie Logan on Tuesday floated the idea of allocating a "modest" part of the Fed's balance sheet to loans and repos, perhaps holding a daily auction of discount-window loans.】

item.title: 烟幕弹：食品及药物管理局打压后，一些 Vape 公司开始转向
item.description: 据美国监管机构和两家公司的代表称，一些被美国当局列为目标的电子烟公司已经改变了业务模式或公司结构，包括将业务转移到离岸公司。【原文：Some e-cigarette companies targeted by U.S. authorities have altered their business model or changed their corporate structure, including by transferring operations to offshore firms, according to a U.S. regulator and representatives of two companies.】

item.title: 韩国政局动荡促使企业自行解决关税问题
item.description: 韩国商界领袖正采取行动抵消美国总统唐纳德-特朗普咄咄逼人的贸易政策带来的威胁，他们雇佣了特朗普的前助手，并游说共和党各州，因为他们对陷入政治危机的本国政府的拖延感到沮丧。【原文：South Korea's business leaders are taking action to offset the threat posed by U.S. President Donald Trump's aggressive trade policies, hiring his former aides and lobbying Republican states out of frustration with delays by their own government which is mired in a political crisis.】

item.title: 日本全日空航空公司将从波音、空中客车和巴西航空工业公司购买至少 77 架飞机
item.description: 日本全日空控股公司周二表示，将斥资约2.1万亿日元（140亿美元）购买至少77架飞机，以补充其机队。【原文：Japan's ANA Holdings said on Tuesday it would spend about 2.1 trillion yen ($14 billion) to purchase at least 77 aircraft to replenish its fleet.】

item.title: 瑞安航空首席执行官表示，预计夏季票价将上涨 4-6
item.description: 瑞安航空首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周二在华沙举行的新闻发布会上说，瑞安航空预计今年夏季票价将上涨 4-6%。【原文：Ryanair expects summer fares to rise 4-6% this year, CEO Michael O'Leary said at a press conference in Warsaw on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟法院支持意大利针对谷歌限制安卓汽车的反垄断裁决
item.description: 欧洲最高法院周二支持意大利反垄断机构的观点，意大利反垄断机构四年前曾对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司处以罚款，原因是谷歌拒绝让 Enel 公司开发的电动汽车应用程序访问其 Android Auto 平台。【原文：Europe's top court on Tuesday sided with Italy's antitrust authority which fined Alphabet unit Google four years ago for refusing to allow an e-mobility app developed by Enel access to its Android Auto platform.】

item.title: 比特币一个月来首次跌破 90,000 美元，以太币暴跌
item.description: 加密货币比特币和以太坊周二跌至数月低点，陷入了普遍的跨市场抛售，交易员们还在继续处理上周加密交易所比比特（Bybit）价值 15 亿美元的以太坊被黑客攻击的事件。【原文：Cryptocurrencies bitcoin and ether dropped to multi-month lows on Tuesday, caught up in a general cross-market sell-off, and as traders continued to process last week's hack of $1.5 billion worth of ether from cryptoexchange Bybit.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，KKR、Fountainvest 和 PAG 均对星巴克中国股份虎视眈眈
item.description: 四位消息人士称，KKR & Co、方源资本（Fountainvest Partners）和 PAG 等收购公司有意收购星巴克中国业务的股份，因为这家美国咖啡连锁店正寻求重振其第二大市场的销售业绩。【原文：KKR & Co , Fountainvest Partners and PAG are among buyout firms interested in acquiring a stake in Starbucks' China business, four sources said, as the U.S. coffee chain looks to revive flagging sales in its second-largest market.】

item.title: 迪士尼合并后，印度 Reliance 公司吹嘘 "脑图 "吸引 IPL 广告客户
item.description: 印度亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）在与华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）达成价值 85 亿美元的媒体合并后，又将目标瞄准了小企业，并推动非常规的神经科学研究，以增加其在 IPL（世界上最有价值的板球联赛）中的收入。【原文：After striking an $8.5-billion media merger with Walt Disney, Indian billionaire Mukesh Ambani is targeting small businesses and promoting unconventional neuroscience studies to boost its revenues from the IPL, the world's most valuable cricket league.】

item.title: 中国称美国加强半导体限制的计划将适得其反
item.description: 中国外交部周二表示，美国胁迫其他国家打击中国半导体产业的计划将适得其反。【原文：The U.S. plan of coercing other countries into going after China's semiconductor industry will backfire, China's foreign ministry said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高盛称亚洲股市呈现创纪录的看涨势头
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）在一份报告中称，上周对冲基金对亚洲股市的押注意愿升至2016年以来的最高水平。【原文：Hedge funds' willingness to boost bets on Asian stocks last week rose to its highest level on Goldman Sachs record since 2016, the bank said in a note.】

item.title: 联合利华首席执行官舒马赫将卸任
item.description: 联合利华周二表示，海因-舒马赫将辞去首席执行官一职，由财务总监费尔南多-费尔南德斯接任。【原文：Unilever said on Tuesday Hein Schumacher will step down as CEO and be replaced by finance chief Fernando Fernandez.】

item.title: 统计局确认德国第四季度经济萎缩 0.2
item.description: 德国统计局周二发布报告称，2024 年最后一个季度德国经济与上一季度相比萎缩了 0.2%，证实了初步数据。【原文：The German economy shrank by 0.2% in the final quarter of 2024 compared with the previous quarter, the statistics office reported on Tuesday, confirming a preliminary reading.】

item.title: 新日铁总裁称将与美国商务部就美国钢铁公司竞购展开谈判
item.description: 新日铁总裁今井忠志（Tadashi Imai）周二表示，新日铁将与美国商务部展开谈判，以重启对美国钢铁公司的收购。【原文：Nippon Steel President Tadashi Imai said on Tuesday talks are set to start with the U.S. Department of Commerce as it aims to revive its bid to purchase U.S. Steel .】

item.title: 在特朗普的关税威胁下，美敦力探索优化生产运营的方案
item.description: 医疗设备制造商美敦力公司的一位高管周二告诉路透社，该公司正在研究调整其全球生产布局的方案，以努力减轻美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划所带来的影响。【原文：Medical device maker Medtronic is looking at options to modify its global manufacturing footprint as part of efforts to mitigate any impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff plans, a company executive told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，印尼与苹果公司就取消 iPhone 16 禁令的条款达成一致
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，印度尼西亚和苹果公司已就解除该国对 iPhone 16 的禁令达成一致。【原文：Indonesia and Apple have agreed on terms to lift the country's ban on iPhone 16s, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 费森尤斯医疗用品公司第四季度业绩略超市场预期
item.description: 本周二，全球最大的透析专业公司费森尤斯医疗用品公司公布了略高于市场预期的第四季度财报，称其医疗服务和医疗使能业务均取得了积极的发展。【原文：Fresenius Medical Care , the world's largest dialysis specialist, reported fourth quarter results slightly above market expectations on Tuesday, citing positive development both in its care delivery and care enablement segments.】

item.title: 联合利华面临减少植物肉暴露的挑战
item.description: 业内专家表示，联合利华可能很难为其植物肉业务吸引到买家，从而使该公司削减不受消费者青睐的产品风险的计划变得更加复杂。【原文：Unilever may struggle to attract buyers for its plant-based meat business, complicating the company's plan to cut its exposure to products which are falling out of favour with consumers, industry experts said.】

item.title: 尽管关税迫在眉睫，多马卡巴仍瞄准美国市场的销售增长
item.description: 多玛卡巴公司首席执行官周二表示，即使这家瑞士接入与安全集团正在研究唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策对其业务的影响，该公司仍希望继续增加在美国的有机销售额。【原文：Dormakaba expects to keep growing its organic sales in the U.S. even as the Swiss access and security group studies the impact of President Donald Trump's tariffs on its business, its CEO said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价中美科技战愈演愈烈，一片红海
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 路透社调查显示：中国房价将进一步下跌，预计到 2026 年才会复苏
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，尽管政府采取的刺激需求措施有助于脆弱的经济复苏，但中国房地产业的前景已变得更加黯淡，预计到明年价格将趋于稳定。【原文：The outlook for China's property sector has turned gloomier despite expectations of price stabilisation by next year as government measures to boost demand help the fragile recovery, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 欧洲 1 月汽车销量下降，内燃机销量下降超过电动汽车销量增长
item.description: 本周二的行业数据显示，由于欧洲主要市场全电动汽车和混合动力汽车注册量的增长不足以弥补汽油和柴油汽车销量的下降，1月份欧洲新车销量下降了2.1%。【原文：New car sales in Europe were down by 2.1% in January, as a jump in fully electric and hybrid-electric car registrations in its main markets was not enough to compensate for falling petrol and diesel sales, industry data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长将会见美国财政部贝森特，推动关税豁免
item.description: 澳大利亚财长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）将于周二在华盛顿会见美国财长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent），堪培拉将寻求豁免唐纳德-特朗普总统上个月宣布的对进口钢铁和铝征收的25%关税。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers will meet with his U.S. counterpart Scott Bessent on Tuesday in Washington, with Canberra seeking an exemption on 25% tariffs on imports of steel and aluminium announced by President Donald Trump last month.】

item.title: 美国运通加入中国支付宝数字支付系统
item.description: 美国运通和支付宝周二表示，全球所有美国运通卡会员现在都可以将其美国运通卡与支付宝数字钱包链接，在中国大陆数千万家商户进行支付。【原文：American Express and Alipay on Tuesday said all global American Express card members can now link their cards to the Alipay digital wallet, enabling payments at tens of millions of merchants across mainland China.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国更新自动驾驶软件，车主称未达到预期目标
item.description: 特斯拉周二在中国对其自动驾驶软件进行了期待已久的更新，增加了城市导航功能，但此举令中国车主失望，他们认为这与埃隆-马斯克的承诺相去甚远。【原文：Tesla on Tuesday made a long-awaited update to its autopilot software in China to add a city navigation feature, but the move disappointed Chinese owners who said it fell short of Elon Musk's promises.】

item.title: 越南为规避美国关税正在考虑什么
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）已宣布征收关税的计划，这几乎会打击越南对其第一大市场出口的所有商品，根据联合国的数据，去年的出口额超过1420亿美元，约占越南国内生产总值的30%。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has announced plans for tariffs that could virtually hit all Vietnam's goods exports to its top market, worth last year more than $142 billion, according to UN data, about 30% of Vietnam's gross domestic product.】
